item.title: Don’t let the technical processes of web development stifle your imagination
item.description: A new post from me, this time at .net magazine. Keep it creative! There’s some pretty cool comments over there too.

item.title: New Adventures in Web Design 2012
item.description: My digest post about New Adventures in Web Design conference –; The Job, The Process and Creativity –; NAConf 2012 is now up on uBelly. I’m now on board with uBelly to cover conferences and other webby stuff. This post is very much the same style as my previous digest posts, but on a different site.
